title: Yami Shibai 5 (Yamishibai: Japanese Ghost Stories 5)
synopsis: The mysterious masked Storyteller returns to tell more twisted tales of horror. Continuing his particular style of kamishibai inspired storytelling, he now finds that his audience is an eerie crowd of young girls, who eagerly await his devilish stories.
staff: [['Yamaguchi, Ayako', ['Script']], ['Kishino, Satoko', ['Script']], ['Banba, Susumu', ['Storyboard']], ['Higuchi, Ai', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
